citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30 am on
14-MAR-17.
USDA and IDALS representatives arrived at the facility at 11:30 am and spoke with a household member who
stated that the licensee was not available for the inspection. The USDA inspector also called the licensee's phone
and left a message. After waiting 30 minutes the USDA and IDALS representatives then left the facility.
Additional Inspectors
Unck Autumn, Veterinary Medical Officer

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30 am on
14-MAR-17.
USDA and IDALS representatives arrived at the facility at 11:30 am and spoke with a household member who
stated that the licensee was not available for the inspection.  The USDA inspector also called the licensee's phone
and left a message.  After waiting 30 minutes the USDA and IDALS representatives then left the facility.
Additional Inspectors
Unck Autumn, Veterinary Medical Officer
